testCases.label: Verify a new set is instantiated correctly
testCases.description: Checks that createSet() returns a non-null Set instance.

testCases.label: Verify a new set starts with size 0
testCases.description: Checks that getSize() returns 0 for a newly created empty set.

testCases.label: Verify adding one item updates set size to 1
testCases.description: Adds one unique item and verifies getSize() returns 1.

testCases.label: Verify the set contains an added item
testCases.description: Adds a single item to the set and verifies it is present while another value is not.

testCases.label: Verify the set contains multiple added items
testCases.description: Adds two items and verifies both values are present in the set.

testCases.label: Verify removing an item updates the set correctly
testCases.description: Adds two items, removes one, and verifies the removed item is gone while the other remains.
